element.name: Double-Bladed Scimitar
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: The double-bladed scimitar is the signature weapon of Valenar elves. A haft of fine wood supports a long, curving blade on either end. Forged with techniques honed over centuries, these blades are strong, sharp, and remarkably light.

element.name: Special (Double-Bladed Scimitar)
element.source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

description.p: If you attack with a double-bladed scimitar as part of the Attack action on your turn, you can use a bonus action immediately after to make a melee attack with it. This attack deals 1d4 slashing damage on a hit, instead of 2d4.
